main: ^Maria! You're back! Is it... safe now?
^It is. We are safe now. You can rest easy, Ephraim.
^Alright. I trust you, Maria. I-I'm glad to hear it.
^W-well, what do we do, now that it's safe?
^It seems as though folk are packing their things, looking to see what they can salvage of their old lives.
^But you can do what you would like, Ephraim. If you want to stay, I would imagine you can.
^I might do that. I owe everything to Beth; I don't think I can just up and leave. I've done enough of that.
^What about you? Are you leaving too?
^I think so, yes. There is something I need to tend to.
^Just making sure that I tied up every loose end. I will be back soon.
